_sText:
Zombie Escape Hold Point Prefab By DEVIOUS

How It Works: 

1. First The Wall Is Made, and the class is set to func_breakable
and given a name (I just named it wall)

2. Next a trigger is made and spread to the area you want it to 
activate in. Ex. If the player touches the trigger the wall will
break in the set amount of time. The Trigger's Class is set to
trigger_multiple (this does not need a name).

3. A new entity is made and the class is set to point_servercommand
and given a name (I just named it timeleft).

4. Go Back To Your Trigger and go to the "Outputs" tab.

5. First, we want to make the wall break so click the "Add" button 
at the bottom. Set My Output named to "OnTrigger" (this means that
something will happen when the trigger is activated)

6. Set Targets Entities Named To whatever you named your wall, (in 
our case its just wall). Set Via this input to "Break" (meaning when
the trigger is touched the wall will break. Finally, set After a 
delay in seconds of... to whatever you want (it will be the amount 
of time until the wall breaks after the trigger is activated, I made 
it 15 seconds).

7. Press the "Add" Button again. For this one we set my output named 
to "OnTrigger" again, Targets entities named to "Timeleft" (which is 
the name of our point_servercommand). Set Via this input to 
"Command" (because we want it to say something). For "With a 
parameter override of" first type "say" and then after it what you 
want the console message to be (I made it HOLD HERE FOR 15 
SECONDS!). After a delay in seconds of will tell the console to say 
what you just typed after a certain amount of time. For example if 
you put 5  seconds in this box, after the player reaches the trigger 
the message will display after 5 seconds.

8. You can repeat step 7 as many times as you want all the way up 
until the wall breaks. If you want it to say "5 SECONDS LEFT TO 
DEFEND" when the wall breaks in 5 seconds, just set a delay of 10 
seconds.

******MAKE SURE YOU CHECK THE BOX THAT SAYS "FIRE ONCE ONLY" ON 
EVERY SINGLE OUTPUT THAT YOU MADE OR THE CONSOLE WILL REPEAT THEM!!
******

I hope this wasn't too confusing to follow :P I tried to make it as 
clear and straight forward as possible.

ENJOY!!
